attributes.action: Protect women from harassment while they are exercising their legal right to abortion.
attributes.additional_details:
Women should have the right to enter and exit an abortion clinic without fear of harrassment from anyone.  We the undersigned would like the government to make the following practisess illegal.
  .  Campaigning against abortion directly outside an abortion clinic
  . To approach women, or staff, while entering or exit an abortion clinic.
  .  To try and identify people using, or working in, an abortion clinic by way of harrassment
  .  To film users or staff of abortion clinics.
